overview: This film tells the story of the protagonist Gu Quan who was accidentally involved in a crime vortex involving money because of his friend's loyalty. However, when he realized that he was wrong, he retreated from the cliff in time and decisively gave up the hopeless friend. Through careful planning and hard tolerance, he finally stepped forward and bravely prevented a crime, defending with his own wisdom and hands Justice on earth.
title: Greedy
